item.title: The Curious Case of Tuftesque Document
item.description: I am too lazy to remove this post. So I keep it here to remind me how to make some tweaks. lorem::ipsum(2) Adipiscing taciti sodales conubia imperdiet dapibus pulvinar quisque velit mus? Tellus ante rutrum suscipit quam eu imperdiet ad quis pellentesque convallis duis! Suspendisse natoque mattis tortor magnis fermentum commodo molestie magnis orci pulvinar vehicula. Varius sollicitudin odio aenean integer lacus sed augue bibendum convallis eros inceptos.

item.title: About
item.description: There is no reason for this blog to exist (like most others), but somehow it does. It does not have a theme. There is no organization. It is basically a nice-looking netherworld.
